name: Lynette van Zijl
content: Lynette van Zijl | Home Home Research Programme committees Postgrad students Publications Teaching Computer Science 214 Computer Science 345/711 CS713 Advanced Automata Lynette van Zijl Computer Science, Stellenbosch University, Private Bag X1, 7602 Matieland, SOUTH AFRICA Office: A520, General Engineering Building, c/o Banghoek- and Joubert Street, Stellenbosch. Tel: +27 21 808 4232 (secretary) E-mail: lvzijl -at- cs.sun.ac.za OR lvzijl -at- sun.ac.za My research interests lie in automata and formal languages, as well as the computer science foundations underlying applications in nature conservation research and assistive technologies. My teaching duties for 2023 include CS214, CS345/CS711, and Advanced Automata theory. Some nice art generated with our cellular automata software (credit: Jacobie Mouton).
